ReturnPolicy.Description:
I will accept returns for 30 days from the day that the item was shipped in accordance with the policy outlined below. Please read it carefully, as this policy is non-negotiable. Buyer must notify seller of the intent to return an item  as quickly as possible after receipt and before doing so.  



All items must be returned in exactly the condition in which they were shipped to the buyer. Every item will be thoroughly inspected before it is shipped and again before a refund is issued. New items must show no signs of wear or use. All original tags must be attached and shoes that came in boxes must be returned in those boxes. With shoes, be aware that the bottoms scuff quite easily— please try them on carpeted surfaces. 



Seller will not issue refunds for any jewelry with scratches, dents, tarnish or markings that were not there when shipped. For leather goods, seller will not issue a refund for any item with scratches, tears, wear marks, or discolorations that were not there when shipped. For clothing, any pulls, holes, stains or smells not present when the item was shipped to the buyer automatically disqualifies the item from being accepted for a refund. 



For all handbags, totes or briefcases costing more than $125, a restocking fee of 20% will be charged. There is a significant amount of time, effort, and cost involved in listing, packing and shipping these bags.  

Refunds will be issued through Paypal within 3 days of receipt of the returned item or items. 


The buyer must pay for all return shipping and must return the item by the same means as it was shipped originally. For example, if it was shipped USPS Priority Mail, then the buyer must return it priority mail. Buyer must provide tracking information to the seller as soon as the item is shipped . If the item was insured when shipped, buyer must provide insurance for the return as well.   The buyer is responsible for the item until seller receives it. Any item lost in transit will not be eligible for a refund. It is up the buyer, not the seller to negotiate with the carrier if there is a problem,  If free shipping was provided initially, then that amount will be deducted from any refund. Original shipping charges will not be refunded unless seller made a material error in the description.



 Please peruse the listings carefully. I put a great deal of time into listing items, and very often, the pictures posted with the listing display any imperfections in the leather for a leather good, the size of the item for clothing, or shoes, etc. So take the time to look in detail at the photos. They are never stock photos, but of the actual item you are purchasing. If I make a material mistake in a description, I will always take the responsibility for that. 

Please realize that not all tags on new items are attached. Many manufacturers place them in the pockets. This is often the case with leather wallets, key cases,etc. If a tag falls off or is dislodged in packing and shipping, that does not constitute a material error in the description. I do my utmost to keep the tags intact, but I am not infallible.

My goal is for you to have an easy, happy buying experience, to want to come back and tell your friends.

Title: NWT Kate Spade " How Charming" Charm Bracelet- 3 Charms
Description: This is an adorable new Kate Spade gold tone link charm bracelet, "How Charming." There are 3 charms on the piece, a cupid's arrow in gold plate with pave stones, an "XO" at the opposite end of the bracelet also with pave stones, and in the middle a smiley face charm with two pink painted hearts, which is signed on the back, "love struck". There is a lobster claw clasp, the Kate Spade "spade" charm, and the tiny signature rectangular piece. It fits an average to larger wrist, but I think it would be big on a very tiny one. It is 7.25 inches long without the extender, which adds about 1.25 inches. It comes with the signature dust bag. It would make a great gift! MSRP $98 plus tax.
